nodes.text: A tooka doll was a stuffed doll of a tooka. It squeaked when squeezed or pressed. The Twi'lek Numa had one as a youngling on the planet Ryloth during the Clone Wars. Around the same era, Wrecker of Clone Force 99 owned one named "Lula." Jyn Erso also had two tooka dolls on the world Lah'mu, which she named "Starrie" and "Koodie." Ben Solo owned a tooka doll while in infacy, which his father Han Solo tried to use to calm his crying.
The bounty hunter Sugi's SS-54 assault ship Halo featured nose art of a tooka doll wielding a knife.
Resistance agent Kazuda Xiono found a tooka doll abandoned in a village on the moon of Najra-Va during a reconnaissance mission in the Dassal system. He took it back to his post at the Colossus.
